constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 166 (Friday, September 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PERRY:
H.R. 5372.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H5175]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To prohibit the Department of Health and Human Services from using any Federal funds to create or maintain an office to address climate and health equity, or for any climate change program, project, or activity.
